'''Michael Spice''' ([[20 May|May 20]], [[1931]]-[[2 November|November 2]], [[1983]]) voiced the part of [[Háma]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4. He also did other voices, such as one of the [[Nazgûl]].
